metadata.description: Main development track for wedding invitation app

tasks.title: Enhance Invitation Display Screen
tasks.description: Improve the invitation view screen with better UI components, animations, and dynamic content loading
tasks.details: The invitation_view_screen.dart needs enhancement to provide a more engaging user experience. This includes adding smooth animations, better typography, and dynamic content loading capabilities.
tasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests for invitation display logic and widget tests for UI components
acceptanceCriteria: Content loads dynamically from data models
Typography and spacing follow design system
Responsive design works on different screen sizes

tasks.title: Implement Photo Gallery Navigation
tasks.description: Add smooth navigation and zoom functionality to the photo gallery
tasks.details: The gallery_screen.dart and photo_viewer.dart need enhanced navigation between photos with smooth transitions and pinch-to-zoom functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Integration tests for photo navigation and gesture handling

tasks.title: Optimize Map Integration
tasks.description: Improve map widget performance and add venue details
tasks.details: The map_widget.dart needs performance optimization and better integration with venue information. Add custom markers and detailed venue information display.
tasks.testStrategy: Test map loading performance and venue information display
acceptanceCriteria: Map loads quickly with custom markers

tasks.title: Complete Message System Implementation
tasks.description: Finish the guest messaging system with real-time updates
tasks.details: The messages_screen.dart and related components need completion. Implement message submission, display, and real-time updates functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test message creation, display, and real-time synchronization

tasks.title: Implement Share Functionality
tasks.description: Add comprehensive sharing options for the wedding invitation
tasks.details: The share_screen.dart needs implementation of various sharing methods including social media, messaging apps, and QR code generation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test sharing functionality across different platforms and apps
acceptanceCriteria: Share via social media platforms works
QR code generation and scanning works

tasks.title: Enhance Editor System
tasks.description: Improve the drag-and-drop editor for custom invitation creation
tasks.details: The editor screens and widget system need enhancement for better user experience. Improve drag-and-drop functionality and widget customization options.
tasks.testStrategy: Test editor functionality with various widget combinations

tasks.title: Complete Internationalization
tasks.description: Finish Korean and English language support implementation
tasks.details: Complete the l10n implementation with proper Korean and English translations for all UI elements and date formatting.
tasks.testStrategy: Test language switching and cultural formatting
acceptanceCriteria: All UI text has proper translations
Text layout handles different languages properly

tasks.title: Fix Home ViewModel Issues
tasks.description: Resolve the uncommitted changes in home_viewmodel.dart
tasks.details: ✅ COMPLETED: Updated wedding date to September 12, 2025 at 7:00 PM and committed changes. Home viewmodel is now clean and functional.
tasks.testStrategy: Review changes and test home screen functionality

tasks.title: Fix Widget Rendering Bugs
tasks.description: Resolve critical bugs in the custom widget system, particularly draggable widgets and editor dialogs
tasks.details: Multiple widget rendering issues identified in the editor system. Focus on draggable_widget.dart, widget_editor_dialog.dart, and custom_widget_factory.dart. Common issues include positioning, state management, and visual glitches during drag operations.
tasks.testStrategy: Create comprehensive widget tests and test drag-and-drop functionality across different screen sizes
acceptanceCriteria: No visual glitches during drag operations

tasks.title: Add New Custom Widgets
tasks.description: Develop additional custom widgets for enhanced invitation customization
tasks.details: Expand the widget library with new components: Timeline widget for event schedule, RSVP form widget, Image carousel widget, Contact info widget, and Social media links widget. Each should integrate with the existing drag-and-drop editor system.
tasks.testStrategy: Test new widgets in isolation and within the editor environment
acceptanceCriteria: RSVP form widget handles user input
Image carousel widget supports multiple photos
Contact info widget formats details properly
Social media widget links work correctly
All widgets integrate with editor system

tasks.title: Improve Widget Editor UX
tasks.description: Enhance the user experience of the widget editing system with better controls and visual feedback
tasks.details: The widget editor needs UX improvements: better visual feedback during drag operations, improved resize handles, clearer selection indicators, and more intuitive property editing panels. Focus on enhanced_size_editor.dart and related components.
tasks.testStrategy: Usability testing with different user interactions and edge cases
acceptanceCriteria: Visual feedback is clear during drag operations
Resize handles are easy to use

tasks.title: Optimize Widget Performance
tasks.description: Improve performance of the widget system, especially with multiple widgets and complex layouts
tasks.details: Widget system performance degrades with complex layouts. Optimize widget_renderer.dart, implement efficient state management, add widget recycling for lists, and optimize re-rendering logic. Focus on memory usage and smooth animations.
tasks.testStrategy: Performance testing with complex widget compositions and memory profiling
acceptanceCriteria: No memory leaks in widget creation/destruction
